00026 namespace Utilities.DataTypes
00027 {
00033     public class Pair<T1, T2>
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00040         public Pair()
00041         {
00042 
00043         }
00044 
00050         public Pair(T1 Left, T2 Right)
00051         {
00052             this.Left = Left;
00053             this.Right = Right;
00054         }
00055 
00056         #endregion
00057 
00058         #region Properties
00059 
00063         public T1 Left { get; set; }
00064 
00068         public T2 Right { get; set; }
00069 
00070         #endregion
00071 
00072         #region Public Overridden Properties
00073 
00074         public override int GetHashCode()
00075         {
00076             try
00077             {
00078                 if (Left != null && Right != null)
00079                 {
00080                     return Left.GetHashCode() ^ Right.GetHashCode();
00081                 }
00082                 return 0;
00083             }
00084             catch { throw; }
00085         }
00086 
00087         public override bool Equals(object obj)
00088         {
00089             try
00090             {
00091                 if (obj != null && obj is Pair<T1, T2>)
00092                 {
00093                     return Equals(Left, ((Pair<T1, T2>)obj).Left) && Equals(Right, ((Pair<T1, T2>)obj).Right);
00094                 }
00095                 return false;
00096             }
00097             catch { throw; }
00098         }
00099 
00100         #endregion
00101     }
00102 }
